content: sweet crocheted bunny to use as a refrigerator magnet or to add to a baby hat **pattern calls for ** scrap yarn--only takes a few yards of 4 ply size g hook 1 10-mm wiggly eye note stitch eyes on for use on hats 1 tiny black pompom for nose and a bigger white one for the tail 1 pin or piece of magnet strip for the back bunny is 2 1/2 tall to top of ear using 4 ply worsted weight 2 tall using sport weight
